original_title: GACKT×東京フィルハーモニー交響楽団 第二回 「華麗なるクラシックの夕べ」
overview: Features the concert performed by GACKT and Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra in the end of 2014. Several of Gackt's most famous hits fully arranged for a classical setting.
title: Gackt X Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra Part II -A Splendid Evening of Classic-
